nodes.bodyText: I suggest we keep these lines to give credits to those who create/refactor the Dart 1.x generator in which the Dart 2.x generator is based on if I'm not mistaken.
nodes.diffHunk:

    * C# (.NET 4.5 refactored): @jimschubert [:heart:](https://www.patreon.com/jimschubert)
    * Clojure: @xhh
-   * Dart: @yissachar
-   * Dart (refactor): @joernahrens

nodes.bodyText:
Minor suggestion to revise as follows to make it clear the output is for Dart 2.x:
Generates a Dart 2.x client library.
Why make it dart2 specific while dart 1.x support is being removed?
To avoid any surprise to new users who may expect the output to work with Dart 1.x.
